metadata.title: Weather or not
metadata.description: Zuga's new performance for young audiences - Weather or not (Ilma)

content_sections.heading: Tulekul / Coming:
content_sections.content:
Zuga Ühendatud Tantsijate uuslavastus "Ilma" / Zuga's new piece "Weather or not"
23.11.2024 @ 15.00 at Sõltumatu Tantsu Lava
23.11.2024 @ 18.00 at Sõltumatu Tantsu Lava
https://www.stl.ee/lavastused/ilma
ZUGA Ühendatud Tantsijate tervitus eriolukorra ajal

content_sections.heading: uudised:
items: Zuga pälvis Hea Teatri Auhinnna 2021 - täname!!!
Zuga on välja tulnud oma liikumispausidega, mis on kättesaadavad STL-i kodulehel https://stl.ee/tootuba/liikumispausid/

extraction_notes: Lines 200-500 contain identical site-wide news content as all other pages. This is an English language page for the new performance announced in the site-wide news. Estonian version titled 'Ilma' available at /etendused-noorele-publikule/ilma. Differentiation through hero background and performance-specific images. Listed in navigation under 'english' submenu as 'Weather or not'. This is the newest production mentioned in announcements across all pages.
